text: Omar Elgeziry (born 20 January 1985) is an Egyptian modern pentathlete. He also had brothers who are pentathletes, namely Emad and Amro. He and Amro participated at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro, in the men's event. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Egyptian male modern pentathletes Category:Olympic modern pentathletes of Egypt Category:Modern pentathletes at the 2016 Summer Olympics
title: Omar El Geziry
